InstructionData.Title: Rec Room Management
InstructionData.Description: Handles ambiance for the rec roomâ€‹
InstructionData.Author: SMiLeY.NET
InstructionData.Instructions:
### Rec Room ### alias Self db alias ShowerProximity d0 alias ShowerSpeaker d1 alias ShowerLight d2 alias Shower d3
alias InProximity r0
define ShowerMusic 9 define PreferredVolume 10 define False 0 define True 1 define LongWideLightHash 555215790
Init: s ShowerSpeaker Volume PreferredVolume s ShowerSpeaker Mode ShowerMusic s ShowerLight Color Color.Pink s ShowerLight On False s Shower On False s Shower Open False sbn LongWideLightHash HASH("Wall Light (Long Wide) - Rec Room") On True
Main: yield l InProximity ShowerProximity Activate s Self Setting InProximity beq InProximity True PersonPresent s Shower On False s Shower Open False s ShowerSpeaker On False s ShowerLight On False sbn LongWideLightHash HASH("Wall Light (Long Wide) - Rec Room") On True j Main
PersonPresent: s Shower On True s Shower Open True s ShowerSpeaker On True s ShowerLight On True sbn LongWideLightHash HASH("Wall Light (Long Wide) - Rec Room") On False j Main
